name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
description: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.
effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {0}. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates {1} Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.
